subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Roger Clemens on Monday, the one you get in a foul mood, was more riveting than the comparatively polite Clemens who appeared opposite Mike Wallace a night earlier on “60 Minutes.”
snippet: The Roger Clemens on Monday, the one you get in a foul mood, was more riveting than the comparatively polite Clemens who appeared opposite Mike Wallace a night earlier on “60 Minutes.”
